overview: And everything vice... that's what these grrls are made of. The hottest girl vocal group on the planet. They're rich, wild and famous... and everybody wants a piece of the "5 Sins". From backstage passes to hot tight asses... From the jam packed stadiums to jam packed bedrooms it's a wet and wild sex charged trip to super stardom filled with the spicy hot sex posse that's on everybody's lips... and wet dreams.
title: The 5 Sins
